description: Try our easy to follow Meringue Christmas Tree With Flake Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Meringue Christmas Tree With Flake Bars
name: Meringue Christmas Tree With Flake Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble meringue, make a 22cm tall cone from paper and place on a platter. Arrange meringues around cone to cover, securing each layer with mousse. Break remaining Flake bars into pieces and use to fill any gaps. Secure one white star to the top of the tree with dark chocolate. Drizzle tree with remaining dark chocolate, dust with icing sugar and serve with remaining stars.
